name: Scout Recon (V)
Lore: 'Familiarity with native terrain is essential to a scout garrison. Imperial command can also put this type of information to effective use.',
Text: 'Find one of your missing characters. OR if your scout is in a battle, activate X Force, where X = the number of scouts you have in that battle. OR add 3 to your total battle destiny during a battle at a site where you have an Imperial and opponent has an alien.',
